metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: OB FC Lead - 2H
content:
Our Opportunity: 
The Fulfillment Center Lead will be hands-on in a start-up operation and will build and maintain relationships with hourly team members in our Belton, MO Fulfillment Center. This person will be someone who likes change and enjoys getting into the details to drive improvements every single day.   
What you’ll do: 

Lead a team of up to 20 hourly associates           
Develop and maintain a safe work environment 
Responsible for achieving all operational goals 
Ability to reward and recognize performance and execute on progressive discipline as needed 
Mentor, train and develop teammates for career progression and learning 


Ability to develop and share best practices across the shifts and network 
Create a positive team dynamic that encourages all employees in the FC to provide feedback and drive change within the facility, adapt to the ever-changing business, and stay focused on the customer experience 
Utilize the site Warehouse Management System (WMS) to optimize perfect order fulfillment and provide operational insights to improve WMS effectiveness 

What you'll need: 

1+ years of leadership experience in fulfillment center/warehouse operations; prefer retail/e-commerce experience 


Excitement for working in a start-up environment with high level of ambiguity and change 
Metrics driven mindset 
Customer service obsession, with willingness to do whatever it takes to satisfy customer needs 
Effective communicator and leader for employees, direct reports, cross-functional teams and executive leadership 
Proven ability to quickly adapt and drive the right results using data 




Highest levels of integrity and ethics 
Must be flexible to work weekends and/or nightshifts 
Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite 





 
 Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.

questions.label: Are you 18 years of age or older?
Have you been employed by Chewy in the past?
Are you legally authorized to work in the United States without employer support or sponsorship?
Are you willing to submit to a post-offer, pre-employment background check and drug test?
How did you hear about Chewy?

values.label: Grace Hopper Celebration of Women in Computing

questions.label: Are you able to occasionally lift up to 70 pounds using an optional team lift, either with or without reasonable accommodation?
Are you able to repetitively lift up to 50 pounds, and walking up to 2 miles per shift, either with or without reasonable accommodation?
Will you require sponsorship to work in the United States at any time in the future?

By clicking “Acknowledge/Confirm” on this form, you agree to receive emails, text messages and calls about your potential employment with Chewy, including this job application, interviewing, and onboarding, as well as your relationship with us, by or on behalf of Chewy, including via automated technology and artificial or pre-recorded voice, at the telephone number provided above. Msg & data rates may apply. Subject to our Terms of Use (https://careers.chewy.com/terms)  and Privacy Policy (https://www.chewy.com/app/content/privacy). Opt-out from these messages at any time by replying STOP to any message from us. Texting STOP to one shortcode will not effectuate a stop request for all shortcodes to which you are subscribed.
